author: Manisha Krishnan, Josh Visser
title: Should I See My Partner If We Don’t Live Together?
description: We've been told to avoid contact with anyone outside of our homes, but it might be possible to make an exception for our significant other.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
Over the past few weeks, weve been inundated with messages to stay home and stay the hell away from other people as much as possible. 
The City of Toronto is even handing out $1,000 fines for people who are s… [+5209 chars]
